name: v2.0.0-rc0
body:
> [!IMPORTANT]  
> This release requires requires rules_js 2.x. It is not compatible with rules_js 1.x. rules_js 2 is currently in RC: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v2.0.0-rc0

WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "a69f9d6e38debec79276e570433e051e4050272831506f7578202f64ff62fc0e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-2.0.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/download/v2.0.0-rc0/rules_terser-v2.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_terser setup #
######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:dependencies.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies")

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@aspect_rules_js//js:toolchains.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "rules_js_register_toolchains")

rules_js_register_toolchains(node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:repositories.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: upgrade to rules_js 2.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/86


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v1.0.1...v2.0.0-rc0

name: v1.0.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark

    name = "aspect_rules_terser",

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

    name = "node",

)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update README so it slurps to docs.aspect.build by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/81
* chore: update to Bazel 6.3.2 and Aspect CLI 5.7.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/82
* chore: BCR testing on Bazel 6 and 7 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/83
* chore: cancel previous GHA from the same PR by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/84
* chore: remove Go by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/85
* chore: don't cancel concurrent main builds by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/87
* fix: add copy_file_to_bin bazel-lib toolchain by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/91
* chore: bump to stardoc 0.6.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/90
* chore: bump to Bazel 7.1.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/88
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/92
* chore: add Aspect bazelrc presets and align ci patterns by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/93


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.14.3...v1.0.1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

name: v0.14.0
body:
⚠️ BREAKING CHANGES ⚠️

The `terser_minified` rule is renamed to just `terser`. This has been planned for a while to do before 1.0 and included in this release to go along with other breaking changes. `terser_repositories` repository rule is removed and a new `node_modules` attribute is now required for `terser`. This changes are BREAKING for all users.

The `//path/to:node_modules` tree target must be passed to the `terser` rule via the `node_modules` attribute. For example,

```
terser(
    name = "minify",
    node_modules = "//:node_modules",
    ...
)
```

You'll need `terser` linked in the node_modules tree provided.

This change has the added benefits of not requiring users to keep the terser version used in their `package.json` in sync with their WORKSPACE and not requiring any changes to `rules_terser` to support new releases of terser.

This change is in the spirit of the changes in rules_webpack [v0.11.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_webpack/releases/tag/v0.11.0) and rules_jasmine [v0.4.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_jasmine/releases) and will also be rolled out to rules_jest, rules_rollup in the near future so the patterns on the downstream rules_js rulesets we maintain are aligned both for maintainers and for users.

## WORKSPACE snippet

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "1a8e6bce01b2316a114e1c415e3d1db560fc472a9ff110168ac859f468d0b0d2",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-0.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/releases/download/v0.14.0/rules_terser-v0.14.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_terser setup #
######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:dependencies.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies")

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

load("@aspect_rules_js//npm:npm_import.bzl", "npm_translate_lock")

npm_translate_lock(
    name = "npm",
    npmrc = "//:.npmrc",
    pnpm_lock = "//:pnpm-lock.yaml",
    verify_node_modules_ignored = "//:.bazelignore",
)

load("@npm//:repositories.bzl", "npm_repositories")

npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: Add the macOS runner to the matrix strategy by @realtimetodie in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/64
* release: publish release artifact by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/67
* chore: update to rules_js 1.19.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/68
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.27.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/69
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.0-rc0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/70
* chore: update to Aspect CLI 5.2.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/71
* refactor: remove vendored terser versions, user must provider their own terser from their node_modules by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/72

## New Contributors
* @realtimetodie made their first contribution in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/64

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

name: v0.13.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "918e7ac036eca1402cae4d4ddba75ecdcdd886ac35bc0624d9f1ebc7527e369b",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-0.13.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/archive/refs/tags/v0.13.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_terser setup #
######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:dependencies.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies")

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the terser tool
load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:repositories.bzl", "terser_repositories")

terser_repositories(name = "terser")

load("@terser//:npm_repositories.bzl", terser_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

terser_npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* feat: vendor package.json files per version for rules_js v1.17.0 support by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/65
* chore: update to rules_js 1.17.0 and aspect_bazel_lib 1.24.2 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/66


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.12.5...v0.13.0

name: v0.12.1
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "38d662f859062ec42ac3b78ba811a43389d77d98be45a04967334a03dcef7ead",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-0.12.1",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/archive/refs/tags/v0.12.1.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_terser setup #
######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:dependencies.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies")

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the terser tool
load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:repositories.bzl", "terser_repositories")

terser_repositories(name = "terser")

load("@terser//:npm_repositories.bzl", terser_npm_repositories = "npm_repositories")

terser_npm_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.16.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/49
* chore: update to Bazel 6.0.0rc1 and test against both 6.0.0rc1 and 5.3.2 on CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/50
* chore: update to rules_js 1.6.6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/51


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.12.0...v0.12.1

* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.35.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/31
* chore: update to aspect_bazel_lib 1.11.8 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/36
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/38
* chore(deps): update build_bazel_integration_testing digest to 7d3e9ae by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/26
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/27
* chore(deps): remove build_bazel_integration_testing by @jbedard in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/39
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_js to v1.3.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/41
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_bazel_lib to v1.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/40
* chore: update to  aspect_bazel_lib 1.12.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/45
* chore(deps): update dependency aspect_rules_js to v1.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/46
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_nodejs to v5.6.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/42
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_stardoc to v0.5.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/44
* docs: remove todos by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/47
* feat: support rules_js 1.6.5 with improved version mirroring by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/48

name: v0.11.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "5b96fd2ecb50ec0628d8d8b9a043b3a025f6202ea27d0975d0c2a29deac7e9da",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-0.11.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/archive/refs/tags/v0.11.0.tar.gz",
)

######################
# rules_terser setup #
######################

# Fetch the Bazel module dependencies

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:dependencies.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies")

rules_terser_dependencies()

# Fetch and register a nodejs interpreter, if you haven't already

load("@rules_nodejs//nodejs:repositories.bzl", "DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION", "nodejs_register_toolchains")

nodejs_register_toolchains(
    name = "node",
    node_version = DEFAULT_NODE_VERSION,
)

# Fetch and register the terser tool
load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:repositories.bzl", "LATEST_VERSION", "terser_register_toolchains")

terser_register_toolchains(
    name = "terser",
    terser_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)
```

[rules_js 1.1.0](https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_js/releases/tag/v1.1.0) is required for this release.

## What's Changed
* fix: use unique npm_import namespace for vendored npm dependencies of rules_terser by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/25
* chore(deps): update actions/checkout action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/17
* chore(deps): update actions/cache action to v3 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/15
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.2.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/14
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel_gazelle to v0.26.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/29
* chore: update to rules_js 1.0.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/32
* chore(deps): update dependency bazel to v5.3.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/33
* chore: update to rules_js 1.1.0 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/34


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.10.0...v0.11.0

## What's Changed
* Add e2e asserting rules setup works for users by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/3
* feat: implement terser rule by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/4
* fix: add mnemonic to terser action by @thesayyn in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/5
* update rules_js by @alexeagle in https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/pull/6

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.0
body:
WORKSPACE snippet:
```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "aspect_rules_terser",
    sha256 = "bb69f13a047a0d3581e6d8fcec8ef64948f921aa664473d8c78dd11a99e12c43",
    strip_prefix = "rules_terser-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/aspect-build/rules_terser/archive/refs/tags/v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@aspect_rules_terser//terser:repositories.bzl", "rules_terser_dependencies", "terser_register_toolchains", "LATEST_VERSION")

# Fetches the rules_terser dependencies.
# If you want to have a different version of some dependency,
# you should fetch it *before* calling this.
# Alternatively, you can skip calling this function, so long as you've
# already fetched all the dependencies.
rules_terser_dependencies()

# Setup a version of terser
terser_register_toolchains(
    name = "terser",
    terser_version = LATEST_VERSION,
)

```
